backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing certificate records and per-principal course enrollments with add/remove, verification, and enrollment queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style mapping of frontend file paths to brief functional descriptions for each component or page.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide explaining root causes of deployment failures and documenting added build and retry-related configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables for light/dark modes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app root and setting meta tags, favicon, and main script.
frontend/scripts/deploy-runner.ts: Node deployment script orchestrating build and deploy steps with retry logic, secret redaction, and structured logging.
frontend/scripts/retry.ts: Utility providing exponential backoff retry logic with detailed attempt logging and failure reporting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main React app layout and configures all routes, including protected dashboard routing with AuthGuard.
frontend/src/components/AccreditationSec: Displays an accreditation section with a heading and a wide accreditation image.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Protects authenticated routes by redirecting unauthenticated users and storing intended redirects.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: Renders a fixed WhatsApp contact button linking to a generated WhatsApp URL.
frontend/src/components/HeroCodeLines.ts: Shows animated, styled code-like text lines for decorative hero section visuals.
frontend/src/components/ScrollToTopOnRou: Scrolls the page to the top on every route change using router subscriptions.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Displays the site footer with branding, navigation links, legal links, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Renders the site header with navigation, login/logout handling, mobile menu, and identity integration.
frontend/src/components/TextImageCarouse: Implements a text-and-image carousel with autoplay, keyboard navigation, and manual controls.
Shows a top contact bar with promo text, email, phone, and social media links.
frontend/src/data/articles.ts: Defines the Article interface and provides a list of article metadata and content for the site.
frontend/src/data/courses.ts: Defines the Course interface and exports a catalog of cybersecurity courses with details and pricing.
frontend/src/data/galleryImages.ts: Exports metadata for gallery images grouped by categories such as branding, courses, and articles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: React hook that detects if the user prefers reduced motion via a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides hooks for checking course enrollment and triggering enrollment mutations using the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark cybersecurity themes and custom UI components.
frontend/src/lib/authRedirect.ts: Implements helpers for storing, retrieving, and clearing post-login navigation targets in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Formats numeric values as INR currency strings.
frontend/src/lib/siteContact.ts: Contains site contact constants and a helper for generating a WhatsApp chat URL.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides simple input validation utilities for required fields and email format.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that configures React Query, Internet Identity, and renders the main app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission text, values, testimonials, and a text‑image carousel. Uses UI cards and static content about the organization and founder.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single article based on slug, including image, metadata, and full content. Handles missing articles with a fallback message and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Lists all articles in a card grid with preview info and navigation to detailed views. Pulls article data from a static articles dataset.
frontend/src/pages/CertificateVerificati: Provides a form to verify certificate IDs via backend actor and shows success or failure results. Handles input, validation, mutation state, and reset logic.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, localStorage submission, and social links. Shows success/error toasts and tracks form state and errors.
frontend/src/pages/CourseDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a specific course, including enrollment flow, payment simulation, and identity checks. Handles navigation, mutations, and UI for payment options.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of available courses with pricing, level, and duration, linking to individual course pages. Uses static course data and standard card layout.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays the user's Internet Identity principal inside a styled dashboard card.
frontend/src/pages/EnrollmentSuccessPage: Shows course enrollment confirmation with course details, amount paid, and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a grid of gallery images with hover effects and category labels.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with login alert, hero section, featured courses, and promotional content.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining data collection, usage, security, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/ResourcesPage.tsx: Lists categorized cybersecurity resources and tools with descriptions and responsible-use notice.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Static terms and conditions page detailing service use, IP rights, conduct, and liability.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, extended utilities, animations, and plugin integration for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Vite’s Node-side tooling with ESNext modules and synthetic imports enabled.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config setting up React, environment variable injection, path aliases, chunk splitting, dev server proxying, and build options.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the ICP dapp’s structure, architecture notes, build issues, and generated image assets.
